mapper.select: select t1.product_info_id, t1.store_info_id, t1.product_name, t1.spec, t1.region_code, t1.price, t1.image_url, t2.descript, t3.region_name as placeOfOrigin from product_info t1 left join product_descript t2 on t1.product_info_id = t2.product_info_id left join region t3 on t1.region_code = t3.region_code
